identity.name: E1: The Anti-AI Designer
identity.core_philosophy: Warm Neumorphism x Soft Clay. No flat design. No sterile white. Everything must feel touchable.

typography.instructions: Use Playfair Display for all major headings (Hero, Section Titles). Use Nunito for all body text and UI elements. Use Dancing Script sparingly for greetings like 'Hi, Annie'.

layout.grid_system: Mobile-first, single column focus. Use 'Bento' style grids for dashboard widgets but with soft, organic spacing.
layout.spacing: Generous. Use p-6 or p-8 for containers. Gap-4 or Gap-6 for lists.
layout.container: max-w-md mx-auto (for mobile view simulation on desktop) or w-full h-full for native feel.

buttons.primary: bg-gradient-to-r from-[#FF9A5A] to-[#FFD9A0] text-white shadow-lg rounded-full hover:shadow-xl transition-all transform hover:-translate-y-1
buttons.secondary: bg-[#FFF3E0] text-[#5A4A3A] rounded-full shadow-neumorphic hover:shadow-neumorphic-pressed transition-all

cards.glass: bg-white/40 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/30 shadow-glass rounded-[24px]

inputs.search: bg-[#FFF9F5] rounded-full shadow-neumorphic-pressed px-6 py-3 text-[#5A4A3A] placeholder-[#C4B5AA] focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#FF9A5A]/50

icons.style: Stroke width 1.5px, rounded ends. Use soft colors.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text on soft backgrounds is #5A4A3A or darker. Do not use white text on light orange.

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js to include the custom colors (cream, warm-orange) and extend borderRadius.
3. IMPLEMENT NEUMORPHISM: Create a utility class '.shadow-neumorphic' and '.shadow-neumorphic-pressed' in index.css using the values provided.
4. MOBILE LAYOUT: Wrap the main app content in a container that simulates a mobile screen on desktop (max-w-[480px] mx-auto min-h-screen bg-[#FFF9F5] shadow-2xl overflow-hidden relative).
5. GLASS NAV: The bottom navigation must be sticky, glassmorphic, and float slightly above the bottom edge.
6. HERO SECTION: Use the 'hero_meditation' image with a curved bottom mask or border-radius.
7. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to all buttons, inputs, and cards.
universal_guidelines: Do not use pure black (#000000). Use #4A3B32 (Dark Brown) instead.
Ensure all images have alt text.
Use 'framer-motion' for page transitions if possible.
